tag_list: fitness, self-improvement, nutrition, health, weight-loss, new-york-city
overview:
Marc Perry is the Founder & CEO of BuiltLean.com and the creator of the BuiltLean Program, an 8 week body transformation program based on “progression” that requires only 3 strength training workouts per week for 45 minutes.

A Yale graduate and former Wall Street Finance Analyst who gained over 30 pounds from a sedentary lifestyle, Marc’s mission is to develop efficient, sustainable approaches to getting lean and fit and help educate and inspire others to improve their health. He has written over 100 articles and produces videos that are viewed by over 200K visitors each month on BuiltLean.com from over 190 countries.

Marc is a highly sought after fitness expert and coach in New York City. He is the owner of a successful personal training and nutrition counseling practice and is regularly featured on TV as the go to expert for helping busy professionals achieve exceptional results.

Marc is a Certified Strength & Conditioning Specialist (NSCA) and a Certified Personal Trainer (ACE).

image.attribution: Marc Perry / Built Lean
